meanings.definition: A very successful and popular movie, song, or other form of entertainment.
meanings.sent1: The new superhero movie was a superhit at the box office.
meanings.sent2: The latest album from the band became a superhit among music fans.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show was such a superhit that everyone in the audience was laughing non-stop.
meanings.sent4: The dance performance was a superhit, leaving the audience in awe of the talented dancers.
meanings.sent5: The children's animated film turned out to be a superhit, captivating young viewers with its colorful characters.

meanings.definition: To be extremely successful or popular.
meanings.sent1: The new song by the artist superhit the charts within days of its release.
meanings.sent2: Her fashion line superhit the market, with everyone wanting to buy her designs.
meanings.sent3: The viral video superhit the internet, gaining millions of views in just a few hours.
meanings.sent4: The new restaurant in town superhit the food scene, attracting foodies from all over.
meanings.sent5: The talented young actor superhit the film industry, landing major roles in blockbuster movies.
